verbose_text: Phosphorylation of Akt-S473 was abolished in both Tsc2 / Rictor double-KO (dKO) and Rictor single-KO (sKO) cells, indicating that mTORC2 is fully responsible for the phosphorylation of Akt-S473 and that, unlike in Tsc2 KO MEFs, mTORC2 was ectopically activated in Tsc2 sKO mESCs.
evidence: mTORC2 is fully responsible for the phosphorylation of Akt-S473
